title: FS/FT Rube Marquard (Hands at Thighs) Sweet Cap SGC 80

posts.post_title: FS/FT Rube Marquard (Hands at Thighs) Sweet Cap SGC 80
posts.post_content:
Hi all, 

I'm looking primarily to trade for either a 206 Speaker PSA 4 - 5, or high grade Ted Williams oddballs.  I would also consider high(er) grade PSA Post WWII Stars.  

If you're interested in purchasing, send me a PM.

Thanks for looking!

[IMG]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m542/nhsportsguy/Rube%20Front_zpsek4sbuc0.jpg[/IMG]

To the top.

Happy Thanksgiving, everyone!
One last bump this year - anyone interested?
